short-description: We are a dynamically growing IT community where you gain access to top industry experts, supporting you in honing your professional skills. Join us to benefit from the best support and development in the IT world.

about-us.description: Order of Devs (OoD) is a dynamically evolving community of developers, whose mission is to create an open space for professional development and to support and inspire participants in their careers in the IT industry. Our community focuses on sharing knowledge, experiences, and best practices to help every member achieve their professional goals. We are a place where developers can acquire new skills, grow as professionals, and collaborate on projects that have a real impact on the IT industry. Our meetings are moderated by experienced leaders who facilitate discussions, encourage interaction, and inspire learning through design, client work, and a practical approach to programming. By promoting good practices, we support the development of Polish IT by raising the quality of solutions delivered and fostering a positive work culture in the industry.
